author: Unreal Engine
description:
Twinmotion is rapidly becoming a go-to tool for easy 3D visualization in nearly every industry. This talk pays homage to Twinmotion’s roots in archviz by showing how it can fit into and enhance every aspect of the AECO lineup, from designing buildings and visualizing engineering data to selling residences. The session also highlights several case studies and hypothetical examples to illustrate Twinmotion's efficacy in these areas. 

Both new and older features are covered in this session, in context as they relate to Twinmotion's usability in multiple phases in the AECO life cycle. Specific features covered include point cloud import, presentations with Twinmotion Cloud, configurations, phasing, animation import, and the Twinmotion-to-Unreal Engine workflow.
title: Twinmotion and the Life Cycle of AECO Projects | Unreal Fest Orlando 2025

author: Unreal Engine
description:
Have a story you're burning to tell but not sure where to start? Do you have the technical mastery, but are looking for the creative outlet to present your narrative system? This session is your answer! 

This talk dives deep into UEFN's Conversation Device and NPC Spawner, essential tools for crafting engaging narratives. Learn to design branching dialogue trees with the Conversation Device; bring your stories to life with dynamic NPCs using the NPC Spawner; integrate Verse scripting to add logic and complexity to your interactions; and build immersive narratives from the ground up, starting with the new Conversation Device template island. 

Come see how you can easily leverage the UEFN toolset to create captivating, story-driven Fortnite experiences that will engage players, and have them waiting for the next chapter to see how characters evolve.
title: UEFN for Storytellers: Mastering the Conversation Device and NPC Spawner | Unreal Fest Orlando 2025
